column5: Last night my 2 year old yelled " daddy help. Her bobber and worm were gone way under. Her pink glow in the dark princess pole bent in half and we were Able to pull the slime to the dock. It was 5-6 lbs, but no picture as the 4 lb test snapped when I was trying to land it. Best laugh ever!!
lol awesome!   I know some 30 year old men that still havent caught one....
